module.name: SMS
module.description: This module is used to configure and manage SMS chat interfaces inside of the new UCP.
module.changelog: *12.0.19* Update History *12.0.18* FREEPBX-8425 SMS Last Message Dates Not Sorting Correctly In UCP *12.0.17* Contact manager updates *12.0.16* Support click to action in UCP *12.0.15* Use contact manager if installed *12.0.14* Support for contact manager *12.0.13* Allow clicking *12.0.12* Tweak the replacer *12.0.11* Regular Expression replacing *12.0.10* Minor fix *12.0.9* Use contact manager if present *12.0.8* Updates for UCP *12.0.7* FREEPBX-7992 Deleting conversations, last message date, reverse sorting fixes. Security. *12.0.6* UCP tweaks *12.0.5* Undefined Index Warning Fix *12.0.4* Clean up so we dont see undefined index issues
